```{r}
data <- read.csv("~/Documents/U G A /Fall 25/STAT4220 - Applied Experimental Designs/PROJECT/Data_Collection.csv")
```

```{r}
colnames(data)
```

```{r}
library(emmeans)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
# converting wide format â†’ long format
data <- data %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = c(GammaWord, PopImage, GammaImage, PopWord),
    names_to = "task_type",
    values_to = "score"
  )

```

```{r}
data <- data %>%
  separate(
    task_type,
    into = c("condition", "task"),
    sep = "(?<=Gamma)|(?<=Pop)"
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    Partcipants = factor(Partcipants),
    condition   = factor(condition),
    task        = factor(task),
    score       = as.numeric(score)
  )

```


```{r}
#summary by condition
data %>%
  group_by(condition) %>%
  summarise(
    mean = mean(score, na.rm = TRUE),
    sd   = sd(score, na.rm = TRUE),
    n    = n()
  )

# Summary by task
data %>%
  group_by(task) %>%
  summarise(
    mean = mean(score, na.rm = TRUE),
    sd   = sd(score, na.rm = TRUE),
    n    = n()
  )
```

```{r}
# Boxplot by condition
ggplot(data, aes(x = condition, y = score)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  labs(title = "Scores by Condition")

# Boxplot by task
ggplot(data, aes(x = task, y = score)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  labs(title = "Scores by Task")

# Histogram of scores
ggplot(data, aes(x = score)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 20) +
  labs(title = "Distribution of Scores")
```

```{r}
# Q-Q plot for normality
ggplot(data, aes(sample = score)) +
  stat_qq() +
  stat_qq_line() +
  labs(title = "Normal Q-Q Plot")

# Residuals vs fitted after main-effects model
temp_model <- lm(score ~ condition + task, data = data)

ggplot(data.frame(
  fitted = fitted(temp_model),
  resid  = resid(temp_model)
), aes(x = fitted, y = resid)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0) +
  labs(title = "Residuals vs Fitted Values")
```
```{r}
anova_model <- aov(score ~ condition + task, data = data)

summary(anova_model)
```
```{r}
emmeans(anova_model, pairwise ~ condition)
```

```{r}
emmeans(anova_model, pairwise ~ task)
```

```{r}
emmeans(anova_model, ~ condition) %>% confint()
emmeans(anova_model, ~ task) %>% confint()
```
